runs.comm: pitched up and width on offer outside off, sliced drive behind point, towards deep third man. Irfan slips at the non-strikers' end
back of a length and on middle, Rath keeps back and defends it to short cover
similar length and line, worked to the left of the bowler to mid-on for one
veering down leg, wide called
shortish and outside off, not much pace to pose a threat. Irfan rocks back and cuts it away behind point again. Deep third man runs across to his right, slides in vain
back of a length and jags in off the seam from outside off, beats the inside edge
Dropped. On a length and swerves away with a hint of extra bounce. Irfan is crease-bound as he wafts and gets an outside edge, the keeper (Wilson) dives to his right and spills it
back of a length and on middle, blocked back to the bowler
Irfan camps back and glides this back-of-a-length ball outside off to backward point

Poynter has redemption. He makes amends for the misfield in the deep the previous over. Short and climbs outside off with extra shoulder. Irfan does not connect properly with a pull. He skews it in the air off a top edge. Poynter settles under it at mid-on
back of a length and slanting away outside off, ignored
good length and slides away with the angle outside off, draws him into a loose waft away from the body. Beaten
and again! Full and angling away outside off, Rath flashes a drive and only meets with thin air

Porterfield nearly pulls off a stunner! Back of a length and outside off, slapped towards backward point. He flings to his left, goes with one hand. It bursts out. Porterfield seeks to recover and grab it on the rebound. No dice.
on a length and outside off, dinked to third man
nudged off the pads to midwicket
straighter in line, tucked in front of square leg. They look for the second but decide against it
back of a length and goes away outside off with the angle and some seam movement as well. Rath pokes and misses
veering onto the pads, glanced to the right of short fine leg for a single
rides the bounce of this short ball and runs it to backward point
short and sprayed wide outside off, reaches out and carves it away to third man
too full and straight, clipped away through backward square leg
beaten soundly! On a length and outside off with some extra bounce and away movement. Draws the batsman forward and zips past the edge
on a length and outside off, Rath throws his bat at a drive and dribbles it to third man off an outside edge
drifting onto the pads, helped with the angle to short fine leg
back of a length and outside off, slashed to extra cover
back of a length and on middle, Rath skips away, makes room and punches a single to mid-off
fractionally short and outside off, slid to backward point off the face. Porterfield throws himself to his left and makes another smart stop. He is prowling out there
Porterfield in action, again! Short and outside off, steered to backward point
kicks up from a shortish length outside off, dinked to third man
down the track, manufactures a length ball and socks a drive through the covers.  Rath reaps reward for intent!
back of a length and rises outside off, Khan seeks to run it down to third man but is defeated by the away shape
classy strike. Away she goes over for a six! Length ball on off, he extends his arms and lifts it over mid-off
bumper down the leg side, Khan sinks under it. Loads of height on it and called a wide
back of a length and curls away outside off, Khan makes room outside leg. Kitchen-sinks it away. The sliced hit flies over third man
Young drags his length back outside off and generates extra bounce. Khan quells it to third man
wide yorker outside off, Rath can't squeeze it out
full and wide outside off, flashed to backward point
fullish and on off, manipulates a single in front of mid-on with nifty wristwork
Rath nearly nicked it behind. Back of a length and angled away outside off. Pokes and does not get bat onto it
angled down leg, wide called
short and wide outside off, Rath rises with it, gets on top of the bounce and cuts it over backward point
full and on the stumps, forward and driven to the covers
stray ball down leg, diverted to fine leg
length ball on middle, blocked back to the bowler
shot! Back of a length and angled away outside off, Rath clears his front leg and slugs it in the air over mid-on... Some power from the 17-year old
loopy full toss, which is whipped to midwicket. Diving save
Mooney pulls the pace off this one outside off, Rath seeks to dab it to third man but is beaten by the change of pace
Rath is crease-bound as he chases this one in the channel with a feeble drive and misses
back of a length and angling away outside off, Rath pushes away from the body and is beaten again
shortish and on off, turned to midwicket
flatter and on middle and leg, goes on the back foot and flicks a single in front of square
Rath steps down the track, Dockrell smartly pulls his length back. Pushed back to the bowler
veering down leg, helped to the man at 45 with a paddle
full, non-turning-ball, which is swept in the gap to deep backward square leg
tucked from off and middle to short fine leg
slides in flat and quick, Khan misses the flick and takes it on the pad. Going down leg...
full and angling away, Rath drives crisply to deep cover
good length and on middle and leg, tucked to deep midwicket
an appeal for lbw from Mooney. It would have slid down leg. It may have pitched outside leg as well. Rath sweeps and misses, taking it on the pad
fuller and outside off, Rath clears his front leg for an almighty slog. He only manages an under edge, which whizzes past off stump

Khan chips a return catch, Mooney drops it but manages to deflect it onto the non-strikers' end. Rath stretches his bat in and makes his ground before the ball dribbles back to the woodwork...Mooney ventures wide of the crease and angles it on off, Khan looks to drive and lobs it back to the bowler, who makes a mess of it
on a length and outside off, flat-bat thump but straight to cover
bowled'em. The middle stump is tiled back. Full and flat, Rath shuffles across off and does not connect with a sweep. Dockrell hits the stumps. End of a start-stop innings from the teenager
down the track and whipped to leg
slid through outside off, Chapman drops back and chops it to the covers
flat and skids on outside off, punched through the covers off the back foot. KOB runs across from square deep cover and puts in a slide to his left but it amounts to nothing
pushed through and turns with extra bounce. Blocked to cover
picked away off the pads to short fine leg for one
good length and on off, knocked to short midwicket
back of a length and top-of-middle line. Chapman makes room and carves it to deep third man
good length, Khan now slithers away outside off. Makes room and skelps it in the air over backward point
back of a length and on middle, Khan camps back and chips it to the left of KOB to long-off
short and width outside off, Chapman sits back and cuts it strongly to the off-side sweeper

leg-side wide and swift work from Wilson to knock the bails off. Has Khan been stumped? He is in trouble, he has to depart. This was an innocuous ball down leg, Khan can't glance it away with the angle. He loses his balance, falls over and drifts out of the crease. He can't turn back in time while Wilson shows off his reflexes...
back of a length and on middle, wristed to the right of midwicket and Hayat gets off the mark right away
slower through the air on off, hangs back and blocks it onto the pitch
clears long leg. Sliding onto the pads, Hayar sinks to one knee and pulls it powerfully over the fielder. Nailed it...
flat and down leg again, diverted finer of fine leg off the pad
fired outside off, pushed to the covers
Dockrell strikes again! The forefinger goes up. Arm-ball on middle, Hayat attempts a another sweep but only connects with thin air now. Trapped plumb in front...
drifts in on middle, poked in front of square leg for one
short and on off, Atkinson stands tall and punches it to short cover
full and on the stumps, Atkinson targets the leg side and ends up french-cutting it past the leg stump. Sneaks away to the fine-leg fence
Atkinson, having made ample room outside leg, has enough leverage to drive this full ball outside off behind point, beats third man as well

Atkinson makes room again, KOB hits the top of off now. KOB has his hands aloft in joy. Back of a length, the batsman aims to run it down to third man and misses. The ball kisses the face and disturbs the stumps
good length, defended on off stump
back of a length and skiddy on off, Aizaz yanks his bottom hand off the bat as he taps it defensively to the covers
straight roller on middle, knocked to midwicket off the front foot
darted down leg, Chapman loads up for a pull and misses
down the track and clipped behind square via an inner edge
good length and slides in to take the pad in front of leg. Going down
pitched up and on off, forward and ekes out an inside edge onto the pad
lobbed up on off, hangs back and drops it in front of point for a single
dragged down outside off, Chapman drops back and crunches a pull over a leaping midwicket. Dockrell pays the penalty for the wide
full and straight, picked up over midwicket for two
soft, soft dismissal. Short ball, possibly a slower one to foil Aizaz's pull. Tamely chipped to midwicket. Stirling flings himself forward and takes it..
full on off, patted to the covers
good length and outside off, steered to the right of third man. Good work in the deep from Balbirnie
length ball on middle, rooted to the crease as the captain blocks
fuller length and on off, Afzal clears his front leg and swishes it over the covers
good length and on the stumps, blocked to cover. Chapman seeks a quick one but then decides against it
picked away off the pads through backward square leg
big whoosh and a miss to a full one outside off
latest of late-cuts. Tanwir waits on this full ball outside off and dinks it to third man
back of a length and on off, dropped in front of the covers. Chapman hares across for a speedy one
full and outside off again, Tanwir has a crack at it and slices it to third man off the outer half of the bat
length and on off, Tanwir sizes it up and launches it high and over the man patrolling the long-off boundary. Clean hit
back of a length and just a shade outside off, Tanwir hangs back and cuts it to third man
back of a length and just a shade outside off, tapped wide of the covers for one
length ball on middle, punted on the bounce to long-on. Does not carry to Poynter
short and wide outside off, slashed to the right of Porterfield at backward point
KOB hunts for a yorker, pushes it full and outside off. Squeezed to Porterfield with an angled bat
yorker outside off, slid down to third man off the face
very full, almost a yorker on middle and leg. Chapman loses his balance and falls over but clips a single to leg
swing and a miss to a length ball outside off. Fooled by the slower cutter
full and darted wide outside off, past the tram-line
full and on the stumps again, drilled down to long-off
dragged to short fine leg off an inside edge
Chapman makes room, Cusack follows him. The former adjusts and loft-drives it to the left of mid-on. Impressive stuff

You can't keep Poterfield out of action. He has been superb on the field. Mooney ventures wide of the crease and bangs a bumpy short ball. Tanwir has to fetch it from outside off. Drags a pull and holes out to deep midwicket
full toss outside off, Chapmal takes toll of it as he slogs it, bisecting deep midwicket and long-on
full toss outside off, Chapmal wants to thump it away. He skewers it in the air off a toe end. Dockrell runs in from deep cover. Drops it by his shoelaces
slower full toss, Chapman shuffles across and ramps it fine of short fine leg. Smartly done..
Chapman makes ample room outside leg. Darted wide outside off. Chapman can't reach out. Mooney outsmarts him..
Chapman falls off the last ball of the innings. Good length and outside off, Chapman wants to launch it over long-on. He mis-hits it and picks out the fielder
